summary: This is an email from an FBI Special Agent in New York, likely to a colleague, discussing the ongoing investigation and imminent arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell. It details efforts to locate Maxwell in Massachusetts using a mobile number and obtaining a GPS warrant, with coordination planned with the Lowell Resident Agency.

persons.name: Ela
persons.context: Sender of the email, an FBI SSA in New York, providing an update on the Maxwell investigation and arrest plans.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the investigation; the FBI has identified a mobile number they believe she is using and is seeking a GPS warrant to locate her for arrest in Massachusetts.

connections.description: Ela, an FBI SSA, is leading or involved in the investigative efforts to locate and arrest Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Investigation Update and Arrest Planning for Maxwell
events.description: FBI SSA Ela emails a colleague confirming contact with the Boston/Lowell RA, possession of a solid mobile number for Maxwell, intent to obtain a GPS warrant, and plans to effect her arrest in Massachusetts once her location is confirmed.

keyFacts: As of June 24, 2020, the FBI was actively tracking Ghislaine Maxwell and believed they had a mobile number she was using.
The FBI was in the process of obtaining a GPS warrant to locate Maxwell's phone in Massachusetts.
Arrest plans for Maxwell were coordinated with the FBI's Lowell Resident Agency in Massachusetts and were imminent pending confirmation of her location.
The communication shows the operational phase of the investigation leading directly to Maxwell's arrest on July 2, 2020.
